game.name: Manor of Sins
game.shortDescription: the detective, receives a strange letter. The letter is brief and mysterious, mentioning an ancient forgotten manor house and the strange chain of events that have taken place there. Players take on the role of a detective and explore this ancient manor full of murder, betrayal, and mystery.
